Articles.Content:
Apparently, you can get stuck with the new EVA features. Even Revert to Launch can't save you because Escape to the pause Menu is unavailable then so you have to Alt F4 out of the Game. Guess something hasn't been thoroughly tested there.
 
Oh yes and I'm carrying so many EVA Kits because I want to try and find out how to use them myself insead of watching Tutorials so I have no Idea yet what I'm doing. And the UI is massive because I was teaching my Girlfriend-who has very bad Eyes-how to play KSP.
 
EDIT: Just added an empty Line to make it easier to read.
 
Edited December 18, 2020 by derbleifuss
